data.quote: Creativity takes courage.
data.author: Henri Matisse

data.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: The main thing is to be moved, to love, to hope, to tremble, to live.
data.author: Auguste Rodin

data.quote: To be an artist is to believe in life.
data.author: Henry Moore

data.quote: Whether you succeed or not is irrelevant, there is no such thing.  Making your unknown known is the important thing.
data.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

data.quote: What moves men of genius, or rather what inspires their work, is not new ideas, but their obsession with the idea that what has already been said is still not enough.
data.author: Eugene Delecroix

data.quote: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.
data.author: Marc Chagall

data.quote: Don’t think about making art, just get it done.  Let everyone else decide if it’s good or bad, whether they love it or hate it.  While they are deciding, make even more art.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn't seem so wonderful at all.
data.author: Michaelangelo

data.quote: One can have no smaller or greater mastery than mastery of oneself.
data.author: Lenoardo da Vinci

data.quote: To send light into the darkness of men's hearts - such is the duty of the artist.
data.author: Schumann

data.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
data.author: Vincent van Gogh

data.quote: Inspiration does exist but it must find you working.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: Everything has its beauty, but not everyone sees it.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless.
data.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

data.quote: Do not fear mistakes - there are none.
data.author: Miles Davis

data.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
data.author: Vincent van Gogh

data.quote: An ounce of practice is better than tons of teaching.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The trouble is you think you have time.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: The more real you get, the more unreal the world gets.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it.
data.author: Bill Cosby

data.quote: Don't give up, Today is hard. Tomorrow will be worse. Day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
data.author: Jack Ma

data.quote: If you don't give up, you still have a chance.
data.author: Jack Ma

data.quote: The only way to work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Be stubborn about your goals, and flexible about your methods.
data.author: Author Unknown

data.quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
data.author: Bo Bennet

data.quote: The goal is not to get rich. The goal is to live rich.
data.author: Darren Hardy

data.quote: You can’t go back and make a brand new start. But, you can start now and make a brand new ending.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Today, figure out what makes you happy and do more of it. Figure out what doesn't and do less of it.
data.author: Mandy Hale

data.quote: Dont let someone else’s opinion of you become your reality.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey.

data.quote: Success does not come to you, you go to it.
data.author: Marva Collins.

data.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill.

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn.

data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
data.author: Helen Keller.

data.quote: Failure is an opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
data.author: Henry Ford.

data.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life--think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.
data.author: Proverb

data.quote: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
data.author: Vaibhav Shah

data.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
data.author: Chris Grosser

data.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: If you don't value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents--start charging for it.
data.author: Kim Garst

data.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
data.author: David Brinkley

data.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don’t let it stop you. Failure builds character.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Don't raise your voice, improve your argument.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
data.author: Bruce Feirstein

data.quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
data.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

data.quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Blessed are those who can give without remembering and take without forgetting.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: What's the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Knowledge is being aware of what you can do. Wisdom is knowing when not to do it.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Your problem isn't the problem. Your reaction is the problem.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
data.author: Ray Goforth

data.quote: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
data.author: Robert Collier

data.quote: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
data.author: Thomas J. Watson

data.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
data.author: Michael John Bobak

data.quote: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing.
data.author: Philippos

data.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear--not absence of fear.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing--that's why we recommend it daily.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: We become what we think about most of the time, and that's the strangest secret.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
data.author: Vidal Sassoon

data.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: I find that when you have a real interest in life and a curious life, that sleep is not the most important thing.
data.author: Martha Stewart

data.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
data.author: Colin R. Davis

data.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
data.author: Ralph Nader

data.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.
data.author: Henry Kravis

data.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
data.author: Mark Caine

data.quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
data.author: Audre Lorde

data.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: There is no traffic jam along the extra mile.
data.author: Roger Staubach

data.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: If you genuinely want something, don't wait for it--teach yourself to be impatient.
data.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

data.quote: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: If you want to make a permanent change, stop focusing on the size of your problems and start focusing on the size of you!
data.author: T. Harv Eker

data.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something--your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I  took the one less traveled by, and that made all the difference.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, or ever seriously consider them as believable or achievable. Winners can tell you where they are going, what they plan to do along the way, and who will be sharing the adventure with them.
data.author: Denis Waitley

data.quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.
data.author: Jane Smiley

data.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quote: I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.
data.author: Diane Ackerman

data.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
data.author: Jim Ryun

data.quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
data.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

data.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
data.author: Francis Chan

data.quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
data.author: George Lorimer

data.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached; it often serves simply as something to aim at.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Success is ... knowing your purpose in life, growing to reach your maximum potential, and sowing seeds that benefit others.
data.author: John C. Maxwell

data.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
data.author: Anatole France

data.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no help at all.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you had to overcome to reach your goals.
data.author: Booker T. Washington

data.quote: Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.
data.author: Theodore N. Vail

data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
data.author: Herman Melville

data.quote: What would you do if you weren't afraid.
data.author: Spencer Johnson

data.quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
data.author: Truman Capote

data.quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
data.author: John R. Wooden

data.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
data.author: Margaret Thatcher

data.quote: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
data.author: Kevin Kruse

data.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: We become what we think about.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
data.author: Woody Allen

data.quote: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
data.author: Christopher Columbus

data.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
data.author: Frank Sinatra

data.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
data.author: Anais Nin

data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for.
data.author: Oliver James

data.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: There is no easy way from the earth to the stars
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: What man actually needs is not a tensionless state but rather the striving and struggling for some goal worthy of him.
data.author: Viktor Frankl

data.quote: If you find something very difficult to achieve yourself, don't imagine it impossible-for anything possible and proper for another person can be achieved as easily by you.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: To be like the rock that the waves keep crashing over. It stands unmoved and the raging of the sea falls still around it.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Many are harmed by fear itself, and many may have come to their fate while dreading fate
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: If it’s endurable, then endure it. Stop complaining.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: To bear trials with a calm mind robs misfortune of its strength and burden.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: If you would be a good reader, read; if a writer, write.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: ...but if a thing is humanly possible, consider it to be within your reach.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: Fire tries gold, misfortune tries brave men.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: True good fortune is what you make for yourself. Good fortune: good character, good intentions, good actions.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
data.author: Viktor Frankl

data.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Choose not to be harmed—and you won’t feel harmed. Don’t feel harmed—and you haven’t been.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: No man is more unhappy than he who never faces adversity. For he is not permitted to prove himself
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: No great thing is created suddenly.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: There is no shame in making an honest effort.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: Ten people who speak make more noise than ten thousand who are silent.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
data.author: Ronald Reagan

data.quote: Believe that you can do it cause you can do it.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: Take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly, and try another. But by all means, try something.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
data.author: André Gide

data.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Never, never, never give up.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
data.author: Neil Armstrong

data.quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: We rise by lifting others.
data.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
data.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, “I’m possible!”
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.
data.author: Wallace D. Wattles

data.quote: ... because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
data.author: Wallace D. Wattles

data.quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
data.author: Bob Proctor, You Were Born Rich

data.quote: Be like a postage stamp. Stick to it until you get there
data.author: Bob Proctor

data.quote: Set a goal to achieve something that is so big, so exhilarating that it excites you and scares you at the same time.
data.author: Bob Proctor

data.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
data.author: Wayne Gretzky

data.quote: Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
data.author: Aristotle Onassis

data.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember--the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
data.author: Charles F. Kettering

data.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
data.author: Lou Holtz

data.quote: If you quit ONCE it becomes a habit.Never quit!!!
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: It is good to dream big but your dreams will never see the light of day if you sleep big too.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
data.author: Swami Sivananda

data.quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
data.author: Reggie Leach

data.quote: Always remember that the future comes one day at a time.
data.author: Dean Acheson

data.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: To be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Do more of what makes you happy.
data.author: Carmel McConnell

data.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: You can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
data.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

data.quote: It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose. That is not a weakness; that is life.
data.author: Jean Luc Picard

data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Wake up early and tackle the day before it tackles you. Be on offense, not defense.
data.author: Evan Carmichael

data.quote: You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can't have it.
data.author: Robert Anthony

data.quote: Successful people are not gifted; they just work hard, then succeed on purpose.
data.author: G.K.Nielson

data.quote: Do it now.Sometimes 'later' becomes 'never'.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: FEarly to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
data.author: Rob Siltanen

data.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

data.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.
data.author: Dr. Henry Link

data.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
data.author: Hasidic Proverb

data.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.
data.author: Don Zimmer

data.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
data.author: C.S. Lewis

data.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
data.author: Confucious

data.quote: If you’re going through hell keep going.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
data.author: Charles R. Swindoll

data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Even if you fall on your face you’re still moving forward.
data.author: Victor Kiam

data.quote: Well done is better than well said.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: It’s always too early to quit.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
data.author: John Burroughs

data.quote: One finds limits by pushing them.
data.author: Herbert Simon

data.quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
data.author: Baltasar Gracian

data.quote: Do not watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again. And that is why I succeed.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
data.author: William James

data.quote: I’d rather attempt to do something great and fail, than to attempt nothing and succeed.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: Your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: There is always room at the top.
data.author: Daniel Webster

data.quote: You can’t build a reputation on what you are going to do.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Success is going from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
data.author: Peter Marshall

data.quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: The more we do the more we can do.
data.author: William Hazlitt

data.quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.
data.author: Virgil

data.quote: The difficult is what takes a little time; the impossible is what takes a little longer.
data.author: Fridtjof Nansen

data.quote: Braving obstacles and hardships is nobler than retreat to tranquility.
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quote: Cultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence.
data.author: B. R. Ambedkar

data.quote: You have brains in your head and feet in your shoes, you can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: The mind that tries to shape tomorrow beyond its capacities will find no rest.
data.author: Rumi

data.quote: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
data.author: Jim Ryun

data.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
data.author: Elbert Hubbard

data.quote: The secret to happiness is freedom. And the secret to freedom is courage.
data.author: Thucydides

data.quote: The struggle ends when the gratitude begins.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Obsessed is a word that the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
data.author: Jimmy Dean

data.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
data.author: Bo Jackson

data.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
data.author: Johnathan Swift

data.quote: No matter how you feel, Get up, dress up, show up and never give up.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to be yourself.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
data.author: William James

data.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
data.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

data.quote: I demolish my bridges behind me...then there is no choice but to move forward.
data.author: Fridtjof Nansen

data.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
data.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

data.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
data.author: Kevin Kruse

data.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
data.author: Florence Nightingale

data.quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
data.author: W. Clement Stone

data.quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
data.author: Kevin Krus

data.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
data.author: Alice Walker

data.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: As long as you think your past is bad you must be improving
data.author: Louis C.K

data.quote: It's okay to have a bad day
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: A ship in the harbor is safe. But that's not what ships are for.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: You have survived every single bad day so far
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Please pay attention very carefully, because this is the truest thing a stranger will ever say to you: In the face of such hopelessness as our eventual, unavoidable death, there is little sense in not at least TRYING to accomplish all your wildest dreams in life.
data.author: Kevin Smith

data.quote: At the age of 18, I made up my mind to never have another bad day in my life. I dove into a endless sea of gratitude from which I've never emerged.
data.author: Patch Adams

data.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote:
Look in the MIRROR...
That's your COMPETITION.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote:
BE STRONG
You never know who you are inspiring
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The greatest success stories were created by people who recognized a problem & turned it into an opportunity.
data.author: Joseph Sugarman

data.quote: I never wake up today with yesterday's problems.
data.author: Anthony Saleh

data.quote:
If you're going through hell,
KEEP GOING.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Fear stops people from accomplishing their goals.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The boundary between what can be and your life, is your ideas
data.author: Pat Waldron

data.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote:
There are three rules.
1. If you do not go after what you want, you will never have it.
2. If you do not ask, the answer will always be no.
3. If you do not step forward, you will remain in the same place.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small
data.author: Asim Premji

data.quote: There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them.
data.author: Charles D Gill

data.quote: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.
data.author: Dr. Suess

data.quote: It's never too late to be whoever you want to be. I hope you live a life you're proud of, And if you find that you're not, I hope you have the strength to start over.
data.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

data.quote: Just because you took longer than others, doesn’t mean you failed.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint', then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: One of the hardest decision you'll ever face in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder.
data.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

data.quote: Don't worry if people don't like you. Most people are struggling to like themselves.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Note to self: Keep going. You’re doing great. You might not be where you want to be yet, but that’s okay. Just take it one step at a time and keep believing in yourself. And remember: No matter what happens, you can still enjoy your life and be happy.
data.author: Lori Deschene

data.quote: People have a way of becoming what you encourage them to be, not what you nag them to be.
data.author: Scudder N. Parker

data.quote: I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do.
data.author: Edward Everett Hale

data.quote: Don’t wait for your feelings to change to take the action. Take the action and your feelings will change.
data.author: Barbara Baron

data.quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand-and melting like a snowflake.
data.author: Francis Bacon Sr.

data.quote: Always concentrate on how far you’ve come, rather than how far you have left to go.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: It is better to take many small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.
data.author: Proverb

data.quote: Don’t be afraid to go out on a limb. That’s where the fruit is.
data.author: H. Jackson Browne

data.quote: To have striven, to have made the effort, to have been true to certain ideals–this alone is worth the struggle.
data.author: William Penn

data.quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
data.author: Benjamin Disraeli

data.quote: What matters is the value we’ve created in our lives, the people we’ve made happy and how much we’ve grown as people.
data.author: Daisaku Ikeda

data.quote: A diamond is just a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Think like a man of action; act like a man of thought.
data.author: Henri L. Bergson

data.quote: If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: He is able who thinks he is able.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: No matter how hard the past, you can always begin again.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
data.author: Einstein

data.quote: Excellence can be obtained if you care more than others think is wise, risk more than others think is safe, dream more than others think is practical, expect more than others think is possible.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Don’t fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: From small beginnings come great things.
data.author: Proverb

data.quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems; be led by your dreams.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: More powerful than the will to win is the courage to begin.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.
data.author: Pema Chodron

data.quote: Commitment in the face of conflict produces character.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Don’t let today’s disappointments cast a shadow on tomorrow’s dreams.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Don’t give up just because things get hard. Give up if you feel in your gut that moving on is the right choice for you.
data.author: Lori Deschene

data.quote: Life isn’t always fair. Some people are born into better environments. Some people have better genetics. Some are in the right place at the right time. If you’re trying to change your life, all of this is irrelevant. All that matters is that you accept where you are, figure out where you want to be, and then do what you can, today and every day, to hold your head high and keep moving forward.
data.author: Lori Deschene

data.quote: I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.
data.author: Joshua Graham

data.quote: Don’t let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: The strongest people aren’t always the people who win, but the people who don’t give up when they lose.
data.author: Ashley Hodgeson

data.quote: At any given moment, you have the power to say: This is not how the story is going to end.
data.author: Christine Mason Miller

data.quote: Life’s blows cannot break a person whose spirit is warmed by the fire of enthusiasm.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find ways to do it.
data.author: Dr. David Schwartz

data.quote: Your belief determines your action and your action determines your results, but first you have to believe.
data.author: Mark Victor Hansen

data.quote: A man’s errors are his portals of discovery.
data.author: James Joyce

data.quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next, skill is knowing how to do it, and virtue is doing it.
data.author: David Starr Jordan

data.quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn’t have the power to say yes.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Turn your face toward the sun and the shadows will fall behind you.
data.author: Maori Proverb

data.quote: Doing your best means never stop trying.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: A hard fall means a high bounce…if you’re made of the right material.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: People who urge you to be realistic generally want you to accept their version of reality.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If we are facing in the right direction, all we have to do is keep on walking.
data.author: Proverb

data.quote: Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they’re supposed to help you discover who you are.
data.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

data.quote: I cannot make my days longer so I strive to make them better.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: We all have problems. The way we solve them is what makes us different.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Whenever you fall, pick something up.
data.author: Oswald Avery

data.quote: Care and diligence bring luck.
data.author: Proverb

data.quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road…unless you fail to make the turn.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Stop being afraid of what could go wrong, and start being excited about what could go right.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: What is not started today is never finished tomorrow.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quote: You can do what’s reasonable or you can decide what’s possible.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
data.author: Daisaku Ikeda

data.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Nothing exterior to me will ever take command of me.
data.author: Walt Whitman

data.quote: Nothing is impossible to him who will try.
data.author: Alexander The Great

data.quote: If there are no struggles, there is no progress.
data.author: Frederick Douglas

data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Visualize this thing that you want, see it, feel it, believe in it. Make your mental blue print, and begin to build.
data.author: R Collier

data.quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
data.author: Anais Nin

data.quote: Human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
data.author: William James

data.quote: Life brings simple pleasures to us every day. It is up to us to make them wonderful memories.
data.author: Cathy Allen

data.quote: Don't let your sorrow come higher than your knees.
data.author: Swedish Proverb

data.quote: Begin somewhere; you cannot build a reputation on what you intend to do.
data.author: Liz Smith

data.quote: Learn all you can from the mistakes of others. You won't have time to make them all yourself.
data.author: Alfred Sheinwold

data.quote: A winner makes commitments. A loser makes promises.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
data.author: Charles Caleb Colton

data.quote: It's good to do uncomfortable things. It's weight training for life.
data.author: Anne Lamott

data.quote: A word of encouragement during a failure is worth more than an hour of praise after success.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
data.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

data.quote: The past does not equal the future.
data.author: Anthony Robbins

data.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
data.author: Tommy Lasorda

data.quote: If you put off everything till you're sure of it, you'll never get anything done.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
data.author: Simone de Beauvoir

data.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
data.author: Arthur Ashe

data.quote: Why should you continue going after your dreams? Because seeing the look on the faces of the people who said you couldn’t will be priceless.
data.author: Kevin Ngo

data.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
data.author: Harriet Beecher Stow

data.quote: Cautious, careful people, always casting about to preserve their reputations can never effect a reform.
data.author: Susan B. Anthony

data.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
data.author: Malala Yousafzai

data.quote: Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
data.author: Golda Meir

data.quote: Knowing what must be done does away with fear.
data.author: Rosa Parks
